resources.string: Enter server IP below or use the \"Discover\" button to connect to the nearby server
Enter a channel name and press one of the buttons

Swipe left and right to see channel and member list (respectively). Type a message and click the Send button to send it to your current chat channel. You can switch your current chat/voice channel from channel list. Press and hold "Mic" button to speak (start speaking once the button turns grey). While the button is yellow someone else is speaking and you can`t speak.

Type in your username and Server IP, and then press "Connect" button to connect to the server with desired IP(if exists). Type your username and leave Server IP empty to press "Discover" and discover available servers. Or press "Start server" to create new server(once your username as admin is set).
Server must have at least one chat channel
Type a channel name and add it as either voice or chat channel (by pressing buttons below). Once you\'re done with adding channels, press "Start server".
